comments:
Found with wswb-I20040407-200404081318-win32-no-hyades.zip and Hyades 3.0 
20040414_1312 driver.

Steps to reproduce:
-------------------
1. Start Eclipse in a new workspace.
2. Import the access.log and error.log from the Hyades samples.
3. Select the two logs, then correlate them using the wizard.
4. Right click on the newly create correlation, Open With -> Log Thread 
Interactions.

You will get a error pop-up with title "Error loading data."
Body of the pop-up says...
Reason:
 java.lang.NullPointerException

The UML2 Sequence Diagram view will still open, but will be empty (i.e. it's 
all white). I don't think it's the log files, because if you open the 
correlation in the log view it opens up fine (with all the data displayed 
correctly).

I don't see any entries being generated in the .log file as a result of this 
error.
Eugene to investigate. If this is not possible for M9, please set to M10.
Stanley, can u attach the stacktrace in .log file, if any for the NPE.

I think I may have a stack trace for this; I pulled this from the console of 
the logtrace JUnit test. Hope this helps.

artifact.getSourceComponentId().getThreadId();
which return null when try to getSourceComponentId, which should never be null.
passing defect to Paul.
